Package Utilities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppCompatPreferenceActivity
    A PreferenceActivity which implements and proxies the necessary calls to be used with AppCompat.
    Classes
    This is an object, class Each class has an array list of topics, a class id, and a title
    LiveFeedVolley
    A Volley class that retrieves the live feed data in a JSON format.
    NavUtil
    This Class controls the navigation drawer.
    Question
    This is an object, question It has the text that it contains, an amount of points, if it is endorsed or not, a timestamp, a creation username, a userid, an id, the topic it belongs to
    RecentActivity
    This is used to get recent activity to make notifications
    Refresh
    This is a class of methods to enable swipe down for request
    Reply
    This is an object, reply It has the text that it contains, an amount of points, if it is endorsed or not, a timestamp, a creation username, a userid, an id, a reply parent (for if it is a reply of a reply) and a question that it was a reply to
    ScrollAwareFABBehavior
    Makes the floating action button disappear or appear depending on the scroll direction
    StringParse
    This class handles all of the string parsing that must be done due to android volley string responses
    SwipeController  
    SwipeControllerActions  
    Topics
    This is an object, Topics It has a title, a creation time, an id, a description, and an array list of questions
    URLS
    This is the class that helps with android volley calls by making final urls
    User
    This is an object that holds information about the current user
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    ActivitiesNames
    Enums of the names of the activities
    Roles
    This takes the number that represents a role and turns it into a meaningful name (admin, teacher, ta, or student)
